description: Rada Miskovic, after weighing risks of direct exposure, chooses to amplify the enigmatic 'Halden Echoes' instead of hard evidence of BCI bias. She discusses the choice with the bartender at Bar 101, aware myths may move people more than facts.

Cryptic audio and written messages, believed to come from Halden's terminal, begin circulating on public channels, sowing confusion and hope. Citizens spread rumors, and underground gatherings form to interpret the 'Echoes.'

A mysterious citywide broadcast of Halden's voice urges citizens to "question the story behind the score," sparking heated public debate. Council factions scramble to counter the narrative but disagree on strategy.
Directorate and Innovator factions within the Council exchange accusations over the origin and intent of the 'Halden Echoes,' each suspecting sabotage and beginning internal reviews.

Amid rising distrust, citizens openly question BCI legitimacy in forums and on the streets. Attempts to quell rumor only fuel myth-making as late-night secret broadcasts and debates continue citywide.
